ISSUE.TITLE: API Preview crashing for tables in custom schema
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION:
### Discussed in https://github.com/orgs/supabase/discussions/16841
Originally posted by **saltcod** June 2, 2023 # Bug report ## Describe the bug The API preview in the table editor crashes when viewing a table in a custom schema ## To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior, please provide code snippets or a repository: 1. Create a new schema 2. Create a new table in that custom schema 3. Select that table from the Table Editor 4. Click the API button 5. Page crashes ## Expected behavior You should be able to view the API docs for a table in a custom schema ![CleanShot 2023-06-02 at 16 25 33@2x](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/assets/105593/ef4e89d6-1231-4e9d-bea2-574daf19d60a)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #15521 from supabase/feat/vercel-integration-v2 little fixes for vercel integration

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #17047 from 0xVikasRushi/fix/description-undefined Fix API Preview crashing for custom schema #17028
